  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_81224</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_81224</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Ciel de nuit</string>
            <string language="en">Night sky</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachthimmel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Céu da noite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cielo di notte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουρανός νύχτας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cielo de la noche</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">C'est la seconde de l'illustration sur trois montrant les étoiles dans le ciel quand on regarde vers le nord. Cette illustration est prise une heure après minuit.</string>
            <string language="en">This is the second of three illustration showing the stars in the sky when looking north. This illustration is taken one hour after midnight.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">minuit</string>
            <string language="en">midnight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nuit</string>
            <string language="en">Night</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">nord</string>
            <string language="en">north</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ciel</string>
            <string language="en">sky</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoiles</string>
            <string language="en">stars</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist die Sekunde der Abbildung drei, welche
die Sterne im Himmel beim Schauen Nord zeigt. Diese Abbildung 
wird eine Stunde nach Mitternacht gedauert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é o segundo da ilustração três que 
mostra as estrelas no céu ao olhar norte. Esta ilustração é 
feita exame de uma hora após a meia-noite.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è il secondo dell'illustrazione tre che 
mostra le stelle nel cielo quando sembra del nord. Questa 
illustrazione è occorr un'ora dopo la mezzanotte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι η δεύτερη της απεικόνισης τρία που 
εμφανίζει τα αστέρια στον ουρανό κατά ο Βορράς. Αυτή η 
απεικόνιση λαμβάνεται μια ώρα μετά από τα μεσάνυχτα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Éste es el segundo de la ilustración tres que 
muestra las estrellas en el cielo al parecer del norte. Esta 
ilustración se toma una hora después de la medianoche.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mitternacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nacht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nord</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Himmel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sterne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">meia-noite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Noite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">norte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">céu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrelas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mezzanotte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Notte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">del nord</string>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
